heading: Terraform Overview
subheading: Use Terraform to safely and efficiently build, change, and version infrastructure.

blocks.heading: Introduction to Terraform
blocks.text: Terraform is an infrastructure as code (IaC) tool that allows you to build, change, and version infrastructure safely and efficiently.

cards.heading: Terraform vs. Alternatives
cards.text: Terraform provides a flexible abstraction of resources and providers.
